basic.description:
A survey of United States history from Reconstruction to the present, emphasizing social and cultural changes.
LEARNING HOURS    120 (36L;84P)
basic.subject: HIST
basic.title: United States 1865-present

extra.enrollment_requirement:
PREREQUISITE    Level 2 or above.
EXCLUSION    No more than 6.0 units from HIST 248/3.0; HIST 249/3.0; HIST 272/6.0
